casebody.data:
Harris Emanuel FORD
v.
Marvin L. POLK, Warden, State of North Carolina. No. 104P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 27, 2007. Harris E. Ford, Pro Se. Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney General, for Polk, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Plaintiff on the 23rd day of February 2007 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Robeson County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th day of February 2007."

Justice HUDSON recused.
